title: Centris.ca Scraper Input
description: Configure search criteria for Centris.ca property listings

propertyTypes.title: Property Types
propertyTypes.description: Types of properties to search (leave empty for all)
propertyTypes.sectionDescription: Define the type of properties you want to find

regions.title: Regions
regions.description: Quebec regions to search (e.g., 'Montreal', 'Quebec City', 'Laval', 'Longueuil'). Leave empty for all Quebec.

neighborhoods.title: Neighborhoods / Arrondissements
neighborhoods.description: Specific neighborhoods within the selected region (e.g., 'Plateau Mont-Royal', 'Rosemont', 'Verdun')

maxPrice.title: Maximum Price ($)
maxPrice.description: Maximum listing price in CAD. Set to 0 for no limit.

maxBedrooms.title: Maximum Bedrooms
maxBedrooms.description: Maximum number of bedrooms. Set to 0 for no limit.

maxBathrooms.title: Maximum Bathrooms
maxBathrooms.description: Maximum number of bathrooms. Set to 0 for no limit.

minLivingArea.title: Min Living Area (sq ft)
minLivingArea.description: Minimum living area in square feet
minLivingArea.sectionDescription: Living area and lot size filters

maxLivingArea.title: Max Living Area (sq ft)
maxLivingArea.description: Maximum living area in square feet. Set to 0 for no limit.

minLotSize.title: Min Lot Size (sq ft)
minLotSize.description: Minimum lot/terrain size in square feet

maxLotSize.title: Max Lot Size (sq ft)
maxLotSize.description: Maximum lot/terrain size in square feet. Set to 0 for no limit.

yearBuiltMax.title: Year Built (Max)
yearBuiltMax.description: Maximum year of construction. Set to 0 for no limit.

listingAge.title: Listing Age
listingAge.description: How recently the listing was posted

maxListings.title: Maximum Listings
maxListings.description: Maximum number of listings to scrape

includeDetails.title: Include Full Details
includeDetails.description: Scrape detailed property information (slower but more data). When disabled, only basic listing info is collected.

includeImages.title: Include Image URLs
includeImages.description: Include all property image URLs in results

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Select proxies to use. Residential proxies recommended for Centris.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum parallel browser sessions. Lower values reduce detection risk.
